questions.question: What does Article 1 of the Indian Constitution state?
questions.article: Article 1: Name and territory of the Union

options.text: India shall be known as Hindustan
India, that is Bharat, shall be a Union of States
India, that is Bharat, is a Union of Territories

questions.question: Which schedule specifies the States and Union territories in the Constitution?
questions.article: First Schedule: The States and territories thereof

questions.question: What is included in the territory of India according to Article 1?

options.text: Only the territories of the States
The territories of the States, Union territories, and acquired territories

questions.question: Who has the authority to admit new States into the Union of India?
questions.article: Article 2: Admission or establishment of new States

questions.article: Article 19: Protection of certain rights regarding freedom of speech, etc.

options.text: Right to freedom of speech and expression
